entries.title: Simple Monetary Policy Rules - Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland
entries.text: Description: We show federal funds rates from 7 simple monetary policy rules based on 3 sets of forecasts for economic conditions. Why so many rules?

entries.title: Update on Fed Funds Rates Based on 7 Simple Monetary Policy Rules
entries.text: The median federal funds rate across seven policy rules and three economic forecasts rises from 3.67 percent in 2022:Q3 to 4.08 percent in 2024:Q3.

entries.title: Monetary Policy Tightening and Long-Term Interest Rates
entries.text: Some financial market participants are concerned that long-term interest rates may increase more than should be expected when the Committee starts to tighten.
